short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cheat on quizzes easily, and maintain a low-profile on all Canvas tests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the Canvas Hack extension, an extension which allows the user to side-step any canvas quiz. Spoof the canvas Kiosk app, and prevent ANY teacher from detecting tab-switching, window switching, and extension opening, during Canvas quizzes/tests. You can also save correct answers in quizzes with multiple attempts. This extension has been rigorously tested to make sure that you are 100% cloaked on Canvas while this extension is purchased and installed!

All CanvasHack features/hacks:
- Tab Detection Bypass: Prevents Canvas from detecting when you leave the tab.
- Undetectable Activity: Makes all actions on Canvas appear normal, even when cheating.
- Split Screen Bypass: Allows for split-screen usage without detection.
- Automatic Activation: Starts running automatically upon extension installation.
- Save Feature: Saves correct answers from previous quiz attempts for reuse on other attempts.
- Kiosk Mode: Mimics the Canvas kiosk app within the browser, avoiding logouts.
- Extensive Testing: Successfully tested by over 80 college and high school students + 7,000 mormal beta testers and not a SINGLE report of the CanvasHack not working.
- Cross-Domain Support: Works on ALL Canvas website domains/urls, including non- .instructure.com ones.

Everything above is activated directly upon installing the extension and purchasing the cheap subscription or one time payment✌️(for more details visit the CanvasHack website listed below ↘️)

In order to book a call in which you can privately test the CanvasHack before purchasing join the discord server linked below!

Learn more about the extension at: https://canvashack.com/

If you have any questions/issues feel free to contact the development team through discord -> (https://discord.gg/eEWFw9th8D)

Full Demo Video with Teacher & Student POV, while cheating with & without the hack: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IX1TamSlnj8
